attributes.action: Provide TfL with Government funding to avoid closures
attributes.additional_details: The closure of Tube lines, roads and bridges if the TfL does not get any funding will end up in severe disruption and some people won’t be able to go to work, specially those who rely on Tube and buses
attributes.background: The TfL need public funding to continue providing service to all.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Extend Government funding to Transport for London (TfL) beyond 4 February
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606828
